alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 1:52PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Duchesne County through 230 PM MDT... At 152 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fruitland, or 17 miles west of Duchesne, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starvation Reservoir, Utahn and Talmage. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 67 and 71. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 44 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
